definitions: in a way that shows an envious resentment of someone or their achievements, possessions, or perceived advantages

examples.text: she stared jealously at his phone
I jealously watched William as he danced with other ladies

shortDefinitions: in way that shows envious resentment of someone or their achievements

definitions: in a fiercely protective or possessive way

examples.text: he jealously guards his family's right to privacy

shortDefinitions: in fiercely protective or possessive way
